title: Bacon and Clam Chowder
ingredients: ['4 rashers streaky bacon, diced', '240g chopped onion', '350ml water', '625g peeled and cubed potatoes', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '750ml single cream', '50g butter', '2 (280g) tins baby clams, juice reserved and finely chopped']
